data.name: Monster Energy Supercross 5 - Credits Multiplier
data.detailed_description:
With the Credits Multiplier you will speed up your game progression by doubling the credits obtained at the end of every race.

What are you waiting for? Buy it now!
data.about_the_game:
With the Credits Multiplier you will speed up your game progression by doubling the credits obtained at the end of every race.

What are you waiting for? Buy it now!
data.short_description: Buy the Credits Multiplier and speed up your game progression!

fullgame.name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 5

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U or AMD Ryzen 5 3400G or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 (2048 VRAM) or Vega 11 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD FX-9590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 VRAM) or Radeon R9 390X (8192 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
